roleset.name: tell lies about someone in print

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Mr. Masson then brought a libel suit against Ms. Malcolm , the New Yorker and Knopf .
example.arg: against Ms. Malcolm , the New Yorker and Knopf

example.name: autogen2
example.text: he had filed separate lawsuits in the Ontario Supreme Court for unjust dismissal against Enfield and for libel against its largest shareholder , Canadian Express Ltd. , and two executives of Hees International Bancorp Inc. , which controls Canadian Express
example.arg: against its largest shareholder , Canadian Express Ltd. , and two executives of Hees International Bancorp Inc. , which controls Canadian Express
